To the uploader, you should have said it on the description that it will take up some space on drive C and how much space will it take.

THIS TORRENT WORKS ON WIN7
...but not as easily as on WinXP presumably.
1) extract to a short directory (ie C:\Games)
2) in the folder that you extracted to, Shift+Right Click, and select "open command window here"
3) type "setup.bat" (without quotes) and press enter.

If for whatever reason this doesn't work (it worked for me, Win7 x64), Right click setup.bat, hit compatibility, and select WinXpSP3, and repeat ALL THE STEPS (setup.bat deletes some things during install, even if the install fails).

Hope this helps :)
